channel.title: Ahh! shit's not going good!

item.title: Ahh! shit's not going good!
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Yeah I know the problem was solved. I am saying it’s really stupid to make a method just to check and see if they have enough coins. You have a way to do that already (with playerHasItem(id, amount)) so stop creating redundant code.

Thanks!

Read full topic

item.title: Ahh! shit's not going good!
item.dc:creator: @CoreVersion CoreVersion
item.description:
@CoreVersion wrote:

[quote=“Bryanc, post:6, topic:420702”]Uh…

[code]if(NPCID == 532) {
int amount = 2147000000;

if(playerHasItem(995, amount)) {
	deleteItem(995, amount);
	addItem(619, 1);
} else {
	sM("You don't have enough money to buy a ticket!");
}

}[/code]

If you have those methods, that should work. If it doesn’t work and you’ve compiled successfully, then playerHasItem is wrong.[/quote]

Problem was solved, but thankyou anyway

Read full topic

item.title: Ahh! shit's not going good!
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Uh…

[code]if(NPCID == 532) {
int amount = 2147000000;

if(playerHasItem(995, amount)) {
	deleteItem(995, amount);
	addItem(619, 1);
} else {
	sM("You don't have enough money to buy a ticket!");
}

}[/code]

If you have those methods, that should work. If it doesn’t work and you’ve compiled successfully, then playerHasItem is wrong.

item.title: Ahh! shit's not going good!
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Same file you are trying to you use for this, put it outside of a method though. You should just have to do.

if(NPCID == 532){
if (hasCoins()) {
deleteItem(995, 2147000000);
addItem(619, 1);
} else {
sM("You dont have the correct money!");
}
}
}

That needs some editing. I know.

Read full topic

item.title: Ahh! shit's not going good!
item.dc:creator: @CoreVersion CoreVersion
item.description:
@CoreVersion wrote:

[size=24pt]Problem Solved!
[/size]

original message
Right, so i have recently followed a tut on how to customise NPCs, however, to avoid being a ‘gravedigger’ i thought i’d post here.

Basically, i’m creating an NPC, with options to buy tickets, and sell tickets.

The tickets cost 2147m. But, i have come to a problem…

When i use this code:

if(NPCID == 532){ if (playerHasItem(995, 2147000000)); { deleteItem(995, 2147000000); addItem(619, 1); } else { sM("You dont have the correct money!"); } }

It allows you to buy the ticket, even if you don’t have the 2147m…
But, i was wondering what the code is i put in } else { so, if the player DOESN’T have 2147m, they can’t buy the ticket…

All i know is ‘playerHasItem’ i don’t know if there is one like ‘playerdoesn’thaveitem’ LMAO, i know thats wrong, but i hope you understand!

This will help me alot!
Thanks in advance,
Core.

Read full topic
